description: Do you work as a contractor in the construction industry? Find out more about the Construction Industry Scheme (CIS), what contractors need to do to account for CIS, and dealing with HMRC and sub-contractors. Get help with your CIS accounting, stay compliant, and find answers to your questions.
name: CIS
